generate_issue.details: USSP indicated it does not support flight authorisation validation which is required to perform the flight authorisation U-space service in Switzerland.

Rejected.summary: Flight authorisation request for with valid flight details should be processed successfully
Rejected.details: All data provided was complete and correct with no errors, conforming to the relevant standardized formats and the data should have been processed successfully.

Failed.summary: Flight authorisation request for with valid flight details should be processed successfully
Failed.details: All data provided was complete and correct with no errors, conforming to the relevant standardized formats and the data should have been processed successfully.

ConflictWithFlight.summary: Flight authorisation request did not contain any operational intents and therefore should not lead to a airspace conflict error.
ConflictWithFlight.details: Operational intents are provided for nominal tests only and flight planning is not expected for flight authorisation test.
